attributes.action: require Local Authorities to openly account for all 'Open Space Payments' taken as a condition of granting planning consent on a case by case basis and to publish in the Local Press full details of the amounts received and the open space projects to which they have been applied.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a condition of granting planning consent a landowner  is required to make an 'open space payment' to the Local Authority, even in those parts of the country where open space is at a premium. More transparency is required to show that these sums are being applied to provision of public open space and not merely bneing treated as another form of stealth taxation.
